title: Jeff Goldblum | Jason Sudeikis
description:
Seth talks to Jeff Goldblum about reuniting with Sam Neill and Laura Dern to shoot the latest Jurassic World movie and shares a story about one of the dangerous T-Rex props in the original Jurassic Park film.

Then, he interviews Jason Sudeikis about his kids’ acting styles and the evolution of his character Ted Lasso.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
